Injury: Acquired from the Vegas Golden Knights.
Selected by the Vegas Golden Knights from the Montreal Canadiens in the NHL Expansion Draft.
Missed the last 2 regular season and first 4 playoff games (lower body injury).
Signed by the Montreal Canadiens to a four-year contract extension.

Torn ligament in left knee, remainder of the regular season.
Re-signed by the Montreal Canadiens to a two-year contract.
